statements: SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT team_lead_id, COUNT(*) FROM projects GROUP BY team_lead_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE team_members @> '[{"id": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"}]';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT project_name, team_lead_id FROM projects WHERE team_lead_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT project_id, project_name, team_members FROM projects WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(team_members) > 0
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_name ILIKE '%database%' AND team_lead_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM projects
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, task_name, due_date FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, task_name, task_description, due_date FROM projects LEFT JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id WHERE tasks.task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM projects LEFT JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_tasks > 3;
SELECT project_status, COUNT(*) AS project_count FROM projects GROUP BY project_status ORDER BY project_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT project_name, team_lead FROM projects WHERE team_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT team_lead, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id GROUP BY team_lead;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline FROM projects;
SELECT task_id, task_description, status FROM tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT team_lead, COUNT(member_id) AS total_members FROM team_members GROUP BY team_lead;
SELECT project_name, team_members.member_name, role FROM projects JOIN team_members ON projects.project_id = team_members.project_id;
SELECT task_id, task_description, due_date, tasks.status, projects.project_name FROM tasks JOIN projects ON tasks.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_name, priority FROM Tasks ORDER BY priority DESC;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT member_name, role FROM Members WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, status, priority FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'Completed' AND priority > 5 ORDER BY priority ASC;

SELECT project_name, COUNT(assignment_id) AS total_assignments FROM Projects JOIN Task_Assignments ON Projects.project_id = Task_Assignments.task_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_assignments > 0 ORDER BY total_assignments DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_id, count(*) as assigned_members FROM task_assignments GROUP BY task_id HAVING assigned_members > 1;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks WHERE status='In Progress';

SELECT t.task_name, tm.member_name, ta.assigned_date FROM tasks t INNER JOIN task_assignments ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id INNER JOIN team_members tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id ORDER BY ta.assigned_date ASC;
SELECT tc.comment_id, tc.member_id, tm.member_name, tc.comment, tc.comment_date FROM task_comments tc INNER JOIN team_members tm ON tc.member_id = tm.member_id WHERE tm.role='Developer';
